resources.string: The shapes of lightnings are indeed fractal!
Have you ever seen such a beautiful fractal? It\'s a Julia fractal
The Nautilus shell has the shape of a golden spiral
The arrangement of flower seeds follows a golden-Fibonacci pattern
A regular pentagon contains the golden ratio in its sides
Operational Research is helpful when dealing with many restrictions, like in an airport!
Graph Theory is one of the branches of Operational Research
The Simplex Method is the core of the very efficient Linear Programming in Operational Research
The shape of hanging ropes is not a parabola... It\'s a catenary!! And this is related with exponential functions
There are many exponential behaviours in everyday processes - compound interest, for instance
Nuclear fission may be modelled by exponential functions
In Quantum Mechanichs, particles are no longer points, but waves! So get ready to use maths to work with them...
Einstein\'s Theory of General Relativity needs the language of maths to describe the curvature of space-time
Electromagnetism (ruled by Maxwell\'s laws) is contained in every single electric device... Imagine a world without electromagnetism!!
